title: What are your views on Bhojpuri songs? - Quora

response.answer_text: Bhojpuri songs used to be very euphonious and lyrical close to 10–15 years ago. I used to be a great admirer of bhojpuri songs at those times. But now, these songs have utterly lost their charisma. Lyrics are laced with vulgar meaning and are totally nonsensical. Music is very noisy and always hurts my ears whenever I listen, that too, accidentally. Songs have no feelings, no emotions at all. The singers, who are in bhojpuri songs’s market today, are lacking of the ABCs of music. Ironically, they do not sing.Instead, they shout. I cannot sing, listen, play today’s bhojpuri songs because I feel embarrassed when I do all this. In a nutshell, bhojpuri songs are not affordable to survive with in this era. Thanks!!!!
